humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 11.0 mm (1.1 cm) in greatest dimension, which falls under the T1 category of tumors that are 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive ductal carcinoma is measured to be 11.0 mm (1.1 cm) in greatest dimension (Part 1, A). Therefore, the T stage is T1, as T1 tumors are between 0.1 cm and 2 cm in size.
